name: Tiki Style Cocktail Workshop
description: Tiki cocktails are invented by Don the Beachcomber. He was inspired by his trips to the Polynesian Islands and brought this lifestyle to Los Angeles and later to his bars and restaurant on Hawaii. In this Tiki workshop we make cocktails like the Mai Tai, the Daiquiri and other exotic cocktails. Prepare yourself at home for this exotic cocktails with the movie Blue Hawaii.
